query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sd_campaign_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  account_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  tactic ENUM('T00020', 'T00030', 'remarketing', 'contextual') DEFAULT 'contextual' COMMENT 'T00020=views remarketing, T00030=purchases remarketing',
  cost_type ENUM('cpc', 'vcpm') DEFAULT 'cpc',
  optimization_goal ENUM('reach', 'page_visits', 'conversions') DEFAULT 'conversions',
  auto_optimize_audiences TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
  auto_optimize_bids TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
  target_acos DECIMAL(10, 4),
  target_roas DECIMAL(10, 4),
  min_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
  max_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
  audience_bid_optimization TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  account_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  tactic ENUM('T00020', 'T00030', 'remarketing', 'contextual') DEFAULT 'contextual' COMMENT 'T00020=views remarketing, T00030=purchases remarketing',
  cost_type ENUM('cpc', 'vcpm') DEFAULT 'cpc',
  optimization_goal ENUM('reach', 'page_visits', 'conversions') DEFAULT 'conversions',
  auto_optimize_audiences TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
  auto_optimize_bids TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
  target_acos DECIMAL(10, 4),
  target_roas DECIMAL(10, 4),
  min_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
  max_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
  audience_bid_optimization TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
